length.description: Length is the measurement of the extent of something in one dimension. Common conversions include meters to feet.

weight.description: Weight is the measure of the gravitational force acting on an object. Common conversions include kilograms to pounds.

temp.description: Temperature is a measure of the heat or coldness of an object or environment. Common conversions include Celsius to Fahrenheit.

area.description: Area is the measurement of the surface of an object. Common conversions include square meters to square feet.

speed.description: Speed is the rate at which an object moves. Common conversions include meters per second to kilometers per hour.

volume.description: Volume is the quantity of three-dimensional space occupied by an object. Common conversions include liters to gallons.

pressure.description: Pressure is the force applied perpendicular to the surface of an object per unit area. Common conversions include Pascals to PSI.
